hook.text: A team in three time zones can't meet at the same time. Async work says: they don't have to.

buildup.text: Asynchronous work replaces meetings with documents, videos, and messages people read on their schedule.

discovery.text: Companies like GitLab run with thousands of employees and almost no real-time meetings.

twist.text: Async requires exceptional writing skills. If you can't write clearly, async communication breaks down.

climax.text: The shift from meetings to writing is the biggest communication change since email itself.

punchline.text: Good writing is the new productivity superpower.

quiz.question: What skill does asynchronous work demand most?
options: The ability to work without breaks
